EmailTemplate.name: CRADA Requires Signature OCC
EmailTemplate.subject: CRADA Requires Signature OCC
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Please find attached the CRADA with {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Partner__c} for the project titled {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Title__c}. This CRADA has been reviewed by [OCC attorney] on [Review Date], and no additional changes have been made. The CRADA has been signed by {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Partner__c}. It is now presented for your signature. Please sign and return a copy by email. Should you have any questions or additional changes, please contact {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Officer__c}.
Thank you.
